::Kluster/Grimmler::

Kluster dives out of the way of the ion disks, glancing at them as 
they burrow into the ground, and then firing a missile at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler swears when Ion disks dig into his left shoulder, sending 
him falling backwards.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I take it that the Wild C.A.T.S. have left by now.  Also, Firefox, 
I'm 
> expecting you to post damage for the Cybertronian Fire now.  And my 
men 
> looked down at you before you posted with Hysteria the first time 
and were 
> going to let her live, but eh, you ticked them off by trying to 
stop their 
> plans)
> 
> The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
> Claw/Minion/Chaos/
> Sixshot/Ares/Double 
> Punch/Beeline/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Vehement/Unitron/
> Firestarter/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Dark One talon rolled, avoiding Windlord and Streetwise's blasts.  -
How 
> pathetic- he laughed to himself.  He activated a comm. unit as a 
plan formed 
> in his neurological circuitry.
> 
> "Iron Raptor," Dark One addressed the Maximal leader over the 
comm., "this is 
> Oblitercon team leader Dark One.  I currently possess the Maximal 
Chordate 
> inside of my form.  If Nemesis Enforcer or anyone of such authority 
in the 
> Alliance ceases to function, so will the fool inside of me.  If 
anyone tries 
> to kill me, he will also die.  Understood?"
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown let out a yell as a welding laser struck into his chest, 
cutting 
> through his armor relatively easy.  He fell back a few feet as the 
laser 
> continued.  He fired two optic blasts, the beam ending.
> 
> Breakdown took out his patented grenade launch from subspace, 
firing off one 
> of the grenades off at First Aid before the Maximal could return 
fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> The high pressured water had knocked Pyro to the ground with a thud 
and had 
> pinned him there, the force of Hot Spot's weapon keeping him down.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss was hit with the freezing vapor and he let out a yell, taking 
his fusion 
> cannon out of subspace as the vapor began to freeze up parts of his 
internals.
> 
> He raised his weapon, only to be struck with two photon blasts from 
Blades 
> knocked him back a few feet, leaving small portions of his armor 
badly 
> damaged.  He fired a single optic blast, knowing he wasn't fast 
enough to 
> raise his weapon, at Blades' left knee.
> 
> ---
> 
> Getting up slowly the mercenary was thankful no one had shot him, 
and this 
> would give him the upperhand.
> 
> Scavenger raised his arms, which held a chain gun, and fired twenty-
five 
> armor-piercing rounds in an arc at Streetwise, First Aid, and 
Blades' legs.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot drove forward slowly, keeping the high-pressure 'river' of 
water 
> upon Pyro, soaking the burnt grassy ground under him, weakening it 
into mud, 
> the pressure of the hose pushing Pyro into it slowly, not allowing 
him to get 
> free.
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove watched Hiss open fire with a single bast and he returned 
fire with a 
> burst of freezing vapor at Hiss' left shoulder joint.
> 
> ---
> 
> The whirly-bird felt the optic blast dig into his knee and it 
almost made him 
> fall forward.  Attempting to get back his balance as he raised his 
weapon, he 
> didn't notice Scavenger and his chain gun.  Six armor-piercing 
rounds tore 
> into his left thigh area, two other rounds striking into his right 
knee.  
> Being off balanced and the precision of the new shots, Blades fell 
forward 
> wtih yell of surprise and pain, slamming chin-first into the burnt 
grass.
> 
> A shock of pain went up into his face, but it didn't dull the 
immense pain in 
> his legs as mech-fluid steadily leaked from the wounds.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid yelled at the grenade, ducking downward as it exploded 
harmlessly 
> behind him by several meters.  Though he dodged the grenade, he saw 
bullets 
> fly, and eight rounds struck him.
> 
> Because of his crouch, his chest and neck were now where his legs 
had been.  
> Four armor piercing rounds struck into his abdomen, two just under 
his 
> sternum narrowly missing his spark, three into his left pectoral 
barely 
> avoiding his spark once more, and one grazed his neck as two more 
passed by.
> 
> He fell backwards, going into stasis lock instantly as the doctor's 
wounds 
> began gushing mech-fluid and he hit the once beautiful but now dead 
looking 
> ground with a dull thud.
> 
> ---
> 
> Streetwise  jumped up in the air, only one of the the nine rounds 
intended 
> for him hit him, piercing into his feet.  He landed, yelping at the 
pain in 
> his right foot.
> 
> He raised his photon pistol, firing off three blasts in anger at 
Scavenger's 
> pelvis.
> 
> ===
> 
> Demon Wulf watched his enemies leave and he raised his sword, 
firing off a 
> blade missile at the CF.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper watched the Wild Cats leave, laughing at 
them.  "Pathetic, they 
> can barely survive for more than a few moments." he chuckled as he 
fired off 
> three fire balls from his mouth at the CF.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw created a black orb in his left hand, throwing it at the 
CF, the 
> orb having the power of a few charges.  He created a blue orb in 
his right 
> hand, throwing it at the CF, the weapon having the destructive 
capability of 
> a large grenade.
> 
> ---
> 
> Chaos got a lock on the CF rather easily, launching off two 5 foot 
long 
> missiles from his missile truck mode at the Cybertronian Fire's 
hull.
> 
> ---
> 
> Minion fired off fifty explosive rounds at CF, twenty-five from 
both cannons 
> at the weakened hull of the ship, laughing.
> 
> ===
> 
> Beeline dive bombed, the weak cyberbee firing three optic blasts at 
three 
> different missiles.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sixshot wathced one of the missiles heading for him blow up, the 
other 
> knocking him back a few feet, cutting at his armor even more.  He 
raised both 
> weapons, firing three hypersonic concussion balsts at Torca, three 
more of 
> the same type from the other blaster at Ratchet.
> 
> ---
> 
> Ares ducked, but the missile heading for him blew up thanks to 
Beeline.  He 
> raised his grenade launcher, a few shells and severla shots 
striking him, 
> knocking him to a sit on his skid plates.
> 
> Sitting, he fired off a grenade at Torca.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch watched as the tusk missile heading for him exploded 
before it 
> could harm him, the cyberbee/scorpion sidestepping most of the 
blasts, some 
> striking the right side of his torso, knocking him back.  He raised 
his left 
> pincher, firing off two energy-signature seeking missiles at Sky 
Lynx. 
> 
> He raised his other pincher firin off two more of the same kind of 
missile at 
> Sideswipe's midsection.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector cursed as shells blew up against him, almost breaching a 
portion of 
> his exo-skeleton.  He fired off two stinger missile sdown at 
Ratchet.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror was struck with a missile from Kluster, knocking him 
backwards out 
> of the way of Grimmler's shots and the missile and shots from 
Ratchet.
> 
> He raised one arm, firing down three ion disks down at Kluster, 
raising his 
> other arm, firing three ion disks down at Grimmler.
> 
> ---
> 
> Bumblebee flew to the left, dodging the missile and eight shots, 
seven more 
> striking him.  He cursed, his armor getting dangerously weak.  He 
raised his 
> left arm, firing off two stinger missiles at Torca, and two more 
from the 
> other weapon at Sky Lynx.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector watched Wild C.A.T.S. flew off and fired off three bolts 
of laser 
> energy at Sky Lynx.
> 
> ===
> 
> Vehement felt the blasts from Tavatron and simply ignored them, 
hovering 
> outside the bridge as Hysteria got up.
> 
> He watced as Hysteria ran into a vent that wouldn't fit anyone 
present, 
> especially Vehement.   The Brotherhood member hovered into the 
base, raising 
> the left barrel for a hand, firing it off towards the autoguns, the 
right one 
> firing off an energy-signature seeking missile at Hysteria, the 
missile's 
> route into the vent and chase down Hysteria.
> 
> Nothing would stop his goal.  
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron felt the flames come up and he looked down in surprise, 
letting out a 
> yell more of surprise than pain as the flames almost harmlessly hit 
him, even 
> with their power up.  He laughed, flying up into the air, firing 
down ten 
> rapid optic blasts at numerous flame throwers as shells picked at 
his armor 
> plating, tearing away at it.
> 
> He received a mession via inner monologue, informing him that his 
horn 
> missiles (launched in a previous post when trying to gain entry via 
main 
> entry way) had reached the center of the main entry way door that 
had been 
> reinforced by the lockdown.  The missiles didn't go off, but 
instead began 
> sending out a shoc kwave of sonic energy designed to weaken the 
metal at the 
> molecular level, designed to destroy 60% of the metal so far.
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter looked down at the flames, bursting into uncontrollable 
laughter. 
>  The flames didn't harm him in the least, he didn't even pay 
attention to the 
> heat, his armor resistant to flames.
> 
> He raised his left arm, firing off a missile at the door to the 
bridge, 
> firing another one from the opposite arm at the door.  He lifted 
off into the 
> air, firing off fifteen rapid laser blasts down at the flame 
throwers, trying 
> to ignore the pain from the numerous rounds striking against his 
heavy armor 
> as and chipped it.
> 
> ===
> 
> Smokescreen raised his long sword, feeling the ground shake ever so 
slightly 
> as numerous missiles were fired, some inside, most outside.  The 
Warrior of 
> Light could feel the Archbishop of the Brotherhood's presence, and 
knew 
> Vehement could sense it the same way.
> 
> The end was possibly near, and Smokescreen would meet it the same 
way his 
> eighteen predecessors had met it in the past two hundred years 
trying to stop 
> Vehement's carnage.
